citation.article-title: Genus Hyphomonas Pongratz 1957 nom. rev. emend., Hyphomonas polymorpha Pongratz 1957 nom. rev. emend., and Hyphomonas neptunium (Leifson 1964) comb. nov. emend. (Hyphomicrobium neptunium).

p.s: Description of Hyphomonas polymorpha nom. rev. emend.
Hyphomonas polymorpha (po.ly.mor'pha. Gr. adj. poly many; Gr. N. morphe shape, body; M.L. adj. polymorpha many shapes)
The type species is Hyphomonas polymorpha Pongratz 1957, 607 nom. rev., with type strain PR728 (= ATCC 33881 = IFAM PR728).
The base composition of the DNA of this smooth strain is 60 mol% guanine plus cytosine, and that of the rough strain variant is 61 mol% guanine plus cytosine (8).
A description of this species has been given by Pongratz (14).
